title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 645-4.12 - Uniform appearance tickets
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 645-4.12 - Uniform appearance tickets

State Regulations
(a) In lieu of proceeding by administrative
process, the commission patrolmen or any law enforcement officer may proceed by
uniform appearance ticket regarding any violation of ECL, article 43 or 71, title 33, or rules or regulations promulgated thereunder, against any person
having the culpable mental states defined in section
15.05
of the Penal

Law. (b) In such case, the
procedures and forms specified in Part 640 of this Title shall apply. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
645-4.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
